about_the_game:
Welcome to Egor’s head!


He had lost himself even before his thirties.
But that was not enough for the fate and Egor got fired.

Such events could be the last straw for anybody. Our hero’s ego shuttered into pieces
and now each piece sounds in its own way.

Or maybe it’s not just ego’s shards but childhood and adolescence traumas
found a will and a voice.

Anyway, the end of this story depends on you.
Will our hero find a new job? Will he get rid of the voices in his head?

Now and further you and only you make all the decisions!
Egor’s fate is in your hands. But maybe… they made you think like that…



Whose voice is this exactly?

Features


  • The battle in Voiceover is just a quarrel between two people, nothing more.
    Not enough arguments for the victory? New Egor’s friends living in his head will help you with their own skills.
    Push your enemies over the edge by maximizing their stress level!

  • Do your skills seem to be too weak? You can level them up and try again.
    Would this worth it? Who knows...

  • Loneliness is not about our hero anymore. His new friends cannot but intervene
    in the dialogues with the citizens and won’t leave Egor alone.
    Because each of them has their own view of life
    and Egor’s relations with the world.



Meow! Please, don't forget about it ^^

content_descriptors.notes:
Heroes can use obscene vocabulary, and voices in the head can be obsessive.

You can turn off an obscene lecture in the game settings, but obsessive voices will not go away...

name: Voiceover
short_description: Voiceover is a single player game, inspired by Disco Elysium and classic JRPGs, where real world is shown through the prism of main character's mental disorders.
